home.title: Hi! I'm Emmanuel Ogbiyoyo
home.description: ``` ``` \ I've worked for different companies across the globe in eCommerce, fintech, insurance and have done interesting freelance work as part of the collective Hello world, I currently work in Tryslide, Saudi Arabia as a Platform Engineer . I Have worked with various technologies such as AdonisJs(NodeJs), ExpressJs, ReactJS, Laravel, RabbitMq Python. I have Built a couple of fintech applications, educational and ecommerce applications.
